items.sentence: It took me a long time to get used to the noise.
Tom says that he\'s never tried eating dog food.
Tom and Mary were seated across from each other.
Tom asked Mary a few questions about her family.
Tom asked Mary where she wanted to go for lunch.
Tom asked his father to help him make a snowman.
Tom and Mary shouldn\'t have signed confessions.
Tom didn\'t tell me he didn\'t know how to swim.
Tom doesn\'t like cats and Mary doesn\'t either.
I can\'t believe I actually wanted to marry you.
